game.name: Abysm
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore the Catacombs of Portsmoor, solve puzzles, uncover the secrets that are lurking in the darkness, and save both yourself and the town above. Abysm is an atmospheric puzzle game, inspired by classics such as Boulder Dash, Supaplex, or Emerald Mines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore the Catacombs of Portsmoor, solve puzzles, uncover the secrets that are lurking in the darkness, and save both yourself and the town above. Abysm is an atmospheric puzzle game, inspired by classics such as Boulder Dash, Supaplex, or Emerald Mines.
